direction.raw_text: Eastern Europe.  Like what?  Romania? Hungary?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Or Czechoslovakia.  The Slavs have been fighting the Germans and the Russians for a thousand years.  These are very intense people and they take things personally. Eddie's cellular rings - he grabs it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah?  Where?  You sure it was a knife? Uh-huh.  Really?  Okay. (to Jordy) We've got another murder - in a hotel on Eighth Avenue.  A stabbing.  Clerk said the room was rented by a Russian... Eddie's moving with Daphne's sketch. JORDY I'll come with you.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: There wasn't a fire.  There'll be nothing for you to do.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I can watch you, Eddie.  Maybe I'll learn something.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This isn't homicide school.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: My parents are from Poland.  I can help with the Eastern European angle.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You're Polish?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: My folks are.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Stay here.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Video POV of the news stand as a hand reaches into frame and picks up a copy of THE NEW YORK POST.  Eddie's photo is on the front page - holding the kitchen timer by the wires. Underneath his picture the caption reads, "DOUBLE HOMICIDE...

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ."  The videocamera widens out revealing Emil standing in front of a Times Square news stand, reading the front page.  The videocamera turns around - until focusing on Oleg himself.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This is second day in America.  First day was very exciting.  Full of thrills and chills.  Over there, is co-star of my new movie, Emil! He turns the camera around - FILMING EMIL.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Who is he?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: New York's finest.  This is his case. The VENDOR - picks up People.  Stephen Geller is on the cover.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This all you want? EMIL Do you know how much killer gets for movie rights?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: In here, says he wants a million.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Million?!  The killer gets one million dollars for a television interview?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Hey, tabloids paid Ted Bundy - famous serial killer - half a million for his interview.  And how much you think Monica got for writing book about the President coming on to her?  It pays to be a killer or a whore in this country. Look, you want magazine or not?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yes.  Both.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: And these. Oleg picks up FILM COMMENT, MOVIELINE and PREMIERE magazine. Emil pays for everything.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Get a taxi. Oleg tucks the magazines in his coat, picks up the suitcases and hails a taxi.  As Emil collects his change he sees an old

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: waiting at the crosswalk.  The light's blinking

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Let me help. Emil gently takes her arm and crosses her to the other side.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Thank you, son. Emil watches her walk on.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The hotel room is a hive of activity.  GIL is dusting the dresser for prints.  Another officer is stripping the bed and putting the bedding into a big, clear plastic bag.  As Eddie enters the crime scene, a POLICE PHOTOGRAPHER is standing in the doorway taking pictures.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Where is she?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Takin' a bath.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Any I.D.?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Still unknown but we're running prints. Kid over there caught the case. Jordy enters.  Leon steps in his way.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Sorry...PD only.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: It's okay. Eddie walks over to a young detective.  TOMMY CULLEN, only

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: is excited to meet Eddie.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tommy Cullen.  Heard a lot about you. Nice to meet you.  Here's what we got. A girl in there, figure her to be a prostitute, looks like she was fighting for her life.  She's got defense wounds on her hands.  Right this way - in the bathroom.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: After you. Eddie follows Tommy into the bathroom.  There's blood splattered all over the walls and the floor.  Honey's topless body lies in the tub tangled in the bloody shower curtain. MURPHY, an Irish medical examiner (M.E.), is examining the body.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Room was registered to a Francis Capra.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Capra?  That's not Czech or Russian. Who said he sounded Russian?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The clerk?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Check the switchboard, see what phone calls were made from this room.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'll do it. Tommy heads out.  Eddie takes out his cigar holder.  Slides out what's left of his cigar.  Re-lights it.  Looks down at Honey's body in the bathtub.  Gil's dusting the tub for prints.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Clothes were off in the other room.  Tub is dry except for the blood.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Any of you guys take a piss lately? Gil looks confused.  Eddie points to the toilet.  Seat is up.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Do the seat for me. Gil crosses to the toilet and starts to dust it.  Eddie stands in the bathroom - studying the scene.  Holding the unlit cigar.  Looking around at the blood splattered walls.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Only one guys checked in?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: C'mere.  You wanna go to homicide school?  Here - make yourself useful. Eddie positions Jordy behind the tub next to the wall.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Our killer...our killer's standing here slashing at her.  She's fightin' him. The blood is splattering this way.  It's on this wall... (pointing to the right of Jordy) And there's some specks over here. (to the left of Jordy) There's nothing here because someone was standing right here.  Someone big.  And he's got blood on him.  Lots of blood. He wouldn't walk out of here like that. (turning to Murphy) Murphy, what kind of knife you think we're talking about here? Murphy pulls out a clear plastic ruler and walks over to the blood-splattered wall.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: If you look here where he missed and hit the wall you see that the marks aren't deep but they're kinda wide... not your everyday kitchen or pocket knife.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What if the tip was broken off?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Could be.  Then we should find it here somewhere.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I think we've already found it. Eddie exchanges a look with Jordy as Tommy, the young detective, returns.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: There was only one call from this room last night.  I dialed it.  It's an escort service.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Did you identify yourself?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Hey, I'm new but I'm not stupid.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Call communications and get an address on that number. Tommy holds up a slip of paper with the outcall service address on it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Good work.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jordy hurries out - catches up with Eddie.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You goin' to the escort service?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You got any better ideas?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Mind if I ride along with you?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This has nothing to do with your fire.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: But what if it does?  You might need my help. As Eddie exits the hotel, a MAN approaches.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Hey, Eddie, can I get your autograph for my son?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jordy catches up.  Eddie finishes signing the autograph using the man's back.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'll let you know what happens.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This is ridiculous.  I'm not gonna be in your way - we can talk the case over.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tell you what - I'll flip you a coin. If you win you can come with me.  If you don't win, you don't come.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'll call it... tails. Eddie pulls out a coin and hands it to Jordy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Okay.  I'll call it.  Heads. Jordy flips the coin and it's heads.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Heads.  See, you lost twice. (beat) Okay.  Get in. Jordy goes for the passenger side of the car.  Before Jordy can get in, Eddie starts to pull away.  Jordy stands on the sidewalk - dejected.  Eddie stops the car again and this time lets Jordy get in.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Eddie and Jordy arrive in front of Rose's door.  Eddie knocks and flips a coin to Jordy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Oh here.  A souvenir. Jordy takes the quarter.  Not understanding what Eddie means. He looks at the quarter.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Two heads.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Better than one. Eddie suckered him with the coin toss.  Jordy reacts.  Eddie laughs - squirts Binaca in his mouth.  Knocks again.  We hear

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Who's there?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Police.  We'd like to ask you a few questions.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I have nothin' to say.  If you wanna contact my attorney...

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Homicide, Miss Hearn.  It's Detective Eddie Flemming.  Open up. Rose reacts.  Immediately UNLOCKS, UNCHAINS and opens the door! ROSE You!  I've seen you on TV! Eddie glances self-consciously at Jordy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: C'mon in.  C'mon in!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: They enter.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Just a minute.  Shit.  And I don't have a camera.  Hold on a second. Rose moves back to the phone - finishes up her conversation in Afrikaner.  We hold on Eddie and Jordy at the door.  Eddie looks around - taking in the place.  FOUR GIRLS are on phones.  Two girls take orders for customers.  The other two work the phone sex lines.  Rose hangs up the phone - turns to Eddie and Jordy:

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What's wrong?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: We don't have her I.D. yet, but one of your girls was killed last night at the King Edward Hotel.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Oh my G-d.  Honey!  Honey's dead?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Do you remember the man who called? Though Rose answers Jordy, she directs her response to Eddie.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah.  He wanted a girl from Czechoslovakia, but I sent him Honey 'cause once they get there, you know, it doesn't really matter - Honey was killed...?  Poor girl...

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Do you have any Czech girls working for you?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Did you tell him you did?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: enters.  Rose speaks to her in Afrikaner.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Boy, she's so popular all the sudden.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What are you saying?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Daphne.  Another guy came in asking me about her, too. Jordy pulls out the sketch, unfolds it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This her?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah.  Sort of.  I tried to recruit her, gave her my card.  She said she'd think about it but I never heard from her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Beautiful eyes.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Who came by looking for her?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He said he was her cousin.  I told him where she works.  They were just here.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Describe him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tall, short-haired, scary eyes.  Second guy with him was...shorter, with a wrestler's build.  And he wouldn't turn his videocamera off me.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He had a videocamera?  Where is she? Quickly!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She washes hair up at Ludwig's - a salon on 63rd and Madison.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: As Eddie speeds through the street, SIREN BLARING.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jordy holds on as Eddie darts in and out of cars with astonishing dexterity.  This man can drive.  Eddie picks up his phone - dials.  Jordy is on his cell phone as well.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Leon - meet us at 63rd and Madison. Hair salon.  Ludwig's. JORDY (overlapping) I'm on my way with Eddie.  Ludwig's. 63rd and Madison.  The suspects might be there already. Eddie looks over as Jordy disconnects.  Eddie picks up a beer he was holding between his legs - finishes it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You thirsty?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'm on duty.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: So am I.  Alright, I'll go inside and you cover the back.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Of course.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Hey!  I always wanted to be a cop when I was a kid.  I dreamed of running up to a door, kicking it in, pulling my gun and yelling 'Freeze!' at the bad guy! What'd you dream about?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I wanted to run up to a building on fire, kick in the door, rush into the smoke and save a kid.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Then I guess we're doin' this the right way, aren't we?  If we pull up to a burning building I'll gladly let you go first. Jordy looks at Eddie - can't deny he's right.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: We're in a moving video POV of Ludwig's, the hair salon - it's big and spacious.  The lens finds THE RECEPTIONIST.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Daphne Handlova?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Daphne?  In the back.  Probably shampooing a customer's hair. Oleg approaches Daphne who is mixing hair dye.  LUDWIG, the owner, is with her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Why are you messing with your hair color again?  You're going to kill your hair. You won't look good with black hair.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I want to do it, alright?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Well, then do it after work.  A customer's waiting. He leaves, a customer approaches.  She smiles at him - turns on the water in the sink then sees - Oleg filming her.  She backs up...suddenly moves to the emergency door!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: There's a garden out there.  Daphne runs toward the alley. Oleg follows her - still videotaping.  As she rounds the corner she bumps into...Emil!  He pulls out his kitchen knife, shoving her against the wall, pushing the blade with the broken tip against her throat.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ...I have a temper. She looks at him, not understanding.  Oleg films the scene.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: When I lose it, I lose control.  I didn't intend to kill Milos but he stole from me.  Cheated me!  When I went to prison, they beat me.  I still didn't tell he was my partner.  I loved Milos like a brother... The tone in Emil's voice - there's an uncharacteristic softness to it.  He wants to reconcile his behavior to her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'm not a killer. The back door opens.  He shoves the knife in his pocket as Ludwig peers around the alleyway.  What he sees is Emil leaning close to Daphne, kissing her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Daphne, will you be coming back to work?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: In a minute, Ludwig. Ludwig leaves.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Smart girl.  I'm glad you're not a whore.  But washing hair?  This is no job for a woman as beautiful as you. They should be washing your hair. Emil reaches into his pocket and pulls out SOMETHING, sticks it in the palm of her hand, closing her fingers around it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I don't want to kill you.  But if you talk, I will. (whispers) I thought you'd want these. He taps her hand...he turns and goes out the rear exit.  Oleg follows.  Jordy arrives.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ...Daphne? She says nothing.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'm a fire marshal.  You remember me from the other night?  You are Daphne, right? She says nothing.  Eddie arrives.  Daphne turns.  Recognizing Eddie.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You don't have to be afraid.  We're here to protect you.  Come with me.  We want to talk to you.  You speak English alright? Eddie looks at Jordy.  Takes Daphne by the arm.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: As they come out, Eddie notices Daphne clutching something in her hand.  He reaches for her hand.  Opens it.  It's a brushed gold necklace.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Did he give you these?  Was he just here? Eddie searches the streets.  Notices Oleg and Emil on the far corner.  Oleg is videotaping him.  Leon and Tommy pull up. Korfin behind.  They all pop out.  Eddie grabs Leon - squeezes his arm - quietly.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The other side of the street.  The guy with the videocamera. (back to Jordy) Don't look - put her in the car. (to Leon) Stay this side.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Stay with her. They start heading down the curb - trying not to attract the attention of Oleg and Emil.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: -UP of the scene from across the corner.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Put the fuckin' camera down!  Let's go! Emil starts to flee.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What follows next is an incredible foot chase with Eddie, Jordy, Korfin and Leon running through traffic - chasing Emil.  Eddie tries to stay in the lead but is running out of breath.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Split up! Jordy runs down one side of Madison - Eddie, the other. Korfin continues down 62nd and Leon covers the other side. They search for Emil, grabbing people, turning them around, missing him.  Emil seems to have disappeared. Leon, gun raised, approaches the cafe.  As he rounds the corner, Emil darts out, cracking Leon across the face!  Leon crashes into a table, dropping his gun.  Emil scoops up the gun and PISTOL-WHIPS Leon.  BEATING the detective to a pulp. People are running from the scene.  Emil takes Leon's wallet. He is distracted by LAUGHTER.  Oleg is VIDEOTAPING the scene.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Emil, look! Oleg swivels with the videocamera.  Korfin is running toward them - pushing through the crowd.  Emil FIRES!  Korfin is blown backwards.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Perfect!  Cut.  Print! Eddie arrives.  Bends down to Leon, whose face is red with blood.  Jordy runs to Korfin, who's laying in the street, shot in the side.  Jordy cradles his partner.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Are you hit?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No.  I'm okay.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Bobby, Bobby!  Where're you hit?!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: It hurts.  Aw, Jesus!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Lay down.  Stay down, Bobby. Jordy looks up as Eddie steps into the center of the street. Cars screech out of the way!  Eddie crouches, taking aim at Emil, who is almost two blocks away.  It's an impossible shot, out of range. But Eddie closes an eye, aims and squeezes off one SHOT.  Two blocks away, Emil topples.  Korfin and Jordy look at Eddie, astonished he made the shot.  Emil scrambles to his feet. Runs.  Eddie holsters his weapon.  Pulls out a handkerchief. Dabs Leon's wounds.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He got my gun!  Motherfucker was filming the whole time!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I know.  Relax.  Take it easy.  Don't worry, we'll get those fuckers.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Eddie and Jordy watch as Korfin on a stretcher, is loaded in an EMS VEHICLE and in b.g., an EMS DOCTOR attends to Leon's bloody face.  Eddie and Jordy turn to go back into the restaurant, now cleared out - as Nicolette Karas arrives with her cameraman.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Detective - can you tell us what happened here?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I can't talk right now.  We have some things to take care of. Jordy moves off, he doesn't want to get pulled in front of Nicolette. Daphne can be seen waiting in the back of the restaurant, maybe twenty feet away.  Tommy stands next to her.  This is where Eddie and Jordy are headed.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I understand, but I noticed that the Fire Marshall is here with you.  Is this somehow related to the fire department?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I really can't give out any information right now at this point.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Okay.  But I do understand that your partner, Leon Jackson's been injured. Is that correct?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He was hurt, but not seriously.  He'll be fine.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Do you have the suspect in custody?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Um...now is not a good time, okay. Detective Jackson's hurt.  He's fine. I've got a Fire Marshall shot, Detective Jackson is hurt but not seriously.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Alright, cut, cut, cut. Mike the cameraman cuts the cameraman - lowers it from his shoulder.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Eddie, are you okay?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah.  Now's not a good time.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Alright.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Alright?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Alright.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Alright.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Okay. Eddie walks into the restaurant.  Throws a look back at her, then enters.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jordy talks to Daphne. DAPHNE I told your partner, I can't help.  I didn't see anything.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: C'mon, start at the beginning.  You know these people?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tamina was a friend of mine.  My shower was broken, she let me use theirs.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Go on. She says nothing.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Whether you tell us or not, we'll find out.  Better if it comes from you.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: If I tell you, will you arrest me?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Arrest you for what?  Why would we arrest you? She still hesitates.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What are you hiding?  Why are you afraid

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She just saw two of her friends killed! They probably threatened her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Is that all there is? She looks at Eddie.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Are you here illegally?  Don't worry about that.  We'll talk to Immigration. They won't deport you.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No, no, don't talk to Immigration! She clams up.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Why not?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Something back home? Jordy leads Daphne to a table - she sits.  Eddie sits across from her.  Jordy crouches down next to her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ...my little sister and I shared a flat - I came home one night and a man was raping her.  His gun was on the chair... He came at me and I shot him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Alright.  That's a justifiable homicide.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yes, but he was a cop.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: A cop?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'm from a small town in Slovakia.  Like the South here.  The Police is right, a civilian is wrong.  So I fled.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Look, we can help you but right now we have to deal with what's happening here. Tell us the truth...is that the truth?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You're a cop - you'll never believe me.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Can I talk to you? Eddie steps away with Jordy.  Keeping his eyes on Daphne. She tries to listen.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She's fucked.  Even if that story is true.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Raw deal. Eddie tilts his head.  Measures Jordy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Look - let me talk to her.  Any leads I get, they're all yours.  Just let me have a first crack at her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You wanna talk to her alone?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What would your girlfriend think of that?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I don't have a girlfriend.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: My point exactly.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'm serious here.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: So am I.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: C'mon.  You intimidate her 'cause you're a celebrity.  She sees me differently.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You're her Savior?  Is she the kid you're gonna save from the burning building?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You know what I'm saying here. Eddie looks at his watch.  Thinks it over.  Measures Jordy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Okay, tell you what, I'll give you a head start.  You take her to the station house.  Don't let her out of your sight. She's the only warm body we got left.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Hey.  I'm a professional.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Women like that have a way of turning professionals into amateurs. He gives Jordy a look and heads for the door.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Emil pulls off his sock and shoe, lifts his foot into a stained sink and washes the blood away, exposing the chunk of pink flesh taken out of his ankle.  Emil grabs some toilet paper, plugs the wound, then cuts the towel off the dispenser with his kitchen knife and wraps his ankle.  He grits teeth in pain.  The lights go out.  Then Oleg adjusts the fluorescent light above the sink.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Gotta light the scene better.  Now it's more moody... like a scene from THE THIRD MAN.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Shut up.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Does it hurt? Emil lifts his foot out of the sink.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This is nothing. Emil lifts his shirt, exposing his back.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Oh, shit.  I hate looking at that!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Don't want to film this? We don't see what Oleg sees - not yet - but from his expression, it's horrible.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Daphne rides in the backseat.  Jordy's watching her in the rearview.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Now I become custody of police department?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: If you cooperate with the DA - maybe they'll help you with your situation.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I will if they don't send me back.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: They won't until this is over. She looks away.  Out the window.  Jordy sees emotion filling her eyes.  She looks back at him - her eyes have teared up.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Are you married?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Divorced.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Do you live alone? (beat) I've been in these clothes since...the killings.  Could we stop at your place? I could take a shower...before I go into custody? Jordy looks at her.  Can't quite tell if she's trying to manipulate him or really just wants to get cleaned up before all the shit starts.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I can't take you to my place.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Somewhere else? Jordy looks at her...

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Staring right at us.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I want to talk to you about something serious. He holds up the diamond engagement ring.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I want to live the rest of my life with you...I don't know you've been married before and I've never been married, but I do love you, and... Eddie is standing in front of a mirror - rehearsing the proposal.  He notices a small dab of blood on his shirtcuff. Leon's blood.  Paulie enters carrying a towel and a vodka tonic.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She's here. Paulie sets down the drink and begins their silent ritual. He hands Eddie the towel.  Eddie wipes off his face and hands, then hands the towel back to Paulie.  Paulie helps Eddie on with his coat.  Eddie takes some Visine out of his coat pocket.  Drops a few in each eye.  HE straightens himself and looks in the mirror, taking a big gulp of the drink.  Eddie sets the glass down and starts out.  Paulie hands him a Binaca.  Eddie gives himself a squirt as he exits.  Paulie follows.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: .B. HERMAN'S RESTAURANT - DAY It's lunchtime...it's crowded.  Eddie takes a seat at a table.  He takes the ring out of his pocket - holds it under the table.  Nicolette Karas walks up to Eddie from behind. Gives him a kiss on the cheek.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Hey, honey.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Hey. She orders a drink in Greek from the Greek waiter, then sits down across the table.  There's a long pause - they just look at each other.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What is your problem?  Why'd you snap at me?  I just wanted a statement.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I can't...I can't answer you just because you want me to answer you!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You didn't have to embarrass me in front of my colleagues.  You could give me something.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Oh, I'm sorry.  Did I embarrass you, sweetheart?  Oh...

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Stop it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Maybe I should just, ya know...turn to the cameras and say, do you mind if we just work something out?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Alright, alright, Eddie.  Don't patronize me.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'm not.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yes you are.  I'm not just some reporter.  I don't just stick a microphone in your face.  You could give me something.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah, well you took the camera and put it right down on the evidence.  That was...

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: That was good.  You were holding the evidence.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You were merciless.  You didn't give a shit if you got me or not.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Well, who was it that taught me how to do that?  Huh?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You're ruthless.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You're not so bad yourself. They look at each other.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: C'mere. They kiss.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Look at this.  You have blood on your shirt.  Whose is it?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Could be Leon's.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jesus.  And last week you came over with blood on your shoes.  What am I going to do with you? Eddie takes her hand.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You know, I been thinkin'...these shoes might look nice with another pair of shoes next to them in the closet. She looks at him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You know, Nicky, I've been married twice before.  My first wife was a professional woman, didn't have time for children.  My second wife...I never wanted to go home to her. Nicolette's phone rings.  Eddie stops - looks at the ringing phone.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What are you doing?  What are you saying? Nicolette's phone keeps ringing.  Eddie stares at it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Eddie? Nicolette's phone keeps ringing.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Don't worry about the damn phone.  I won't answer it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Answer the phone.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No.  Tell me what you want to say.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Answer it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Okay.  Okay.  Hold that thought just for a second.  They only call me when it's an emergency.  Just hold that thought. (into the phone) Can you call back?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: We need you here in twenty minutes.  Get in a cab.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What're you talking about?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Katie.  We don't know where she is.  We can't find her.  You gotta anchor the

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: :00.  This is your shot.  Come now.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What?  Oh.  Okay.  Yeah. The line disconnects.  She collapses the phone.  Turns to Eddie.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Oh my G-d, they want me to anchor.  They want me to anchor tonight!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: That's good.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Well, that's great.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Okay.  That is great.  But I can't go now, we're in the middle of something here.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No.  Go ahead.  You're gonna be great.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No.  No, listen to me here.  I want to know what you're talking about.  You know, the shoe thing and the marriages and...

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'll tell you tonight.  Let's do it tonight.  As soon as you get back we'll talk.  We'll talk.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Promise?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I promise.  We'll talk.  You'll be great.  You'll be fine.  Go ahead, just imagine that, uh... Just look into the lens and imagine you're talking to me.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah.  I'll do that.  As long as you're not patronizing me.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Patronizing you... Nay, I love you.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I love you. They kiss.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Okay, til tonight.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tonight.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You promise?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah.  I promise.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Okay.  And you know what, I'll swing by my place, grab a couple pairs of shoes and maybe just test them out next to yours...How's that... Would that be a good thing.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah.  Good thing.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Okay.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: See you later.  Good luck.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Thank you.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Don't be late. She walks out.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jordy unlocks the door.  Enters with Daphne.  The fire station is empty.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The men are out of quarters - practicing putting out fires.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: So...the station is empty?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah.  This way. He gestures toward the stairs.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jordy and Daphne walk through the locker room.  Her eyes never leaving Jordy's.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You considered becoming a prostitute?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yes, I considered it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Did you ever turn tricks before?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What about back home?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No. Daphne stops.  Looks at him.  Stands very close.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I came here.  I had no money.  I knew no one.  I couldn't get a job because you have to have a green card to get work. They approached me - I could've made a lot of money.  I considered it, but... it's not who I am.  They pay me below the table at Ludwig's.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: So you were never a prostitute?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What are you asking me?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'm just trying to find out who you are. She looks up into his eyes.  Searching.  Thinking he's hinting.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Can you let me go? She leans in close to him - giving him the opportunity to kiss her.  Jordy is tempted but...remembers Eddie's warning and backs up slightly.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Showers are this way. Desperate now, willing to do anything, Daphne moves in even closer.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You could shower with me. Jordy is locked in her eyes.  Almost giving in.  Then breaks away.  Gestures towards the showers. Daphne looks away form him - crestfallen.  She heads to the showers.  Jordy follows her into the bathroom.  The walls are lined with shower stalls.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'll uh, I'll get you a towel. He leaves her there.  Alone.  She quickly moves to the window.  Opens it.  Looks down.  It's a two-story drop to the street.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: gets a towel from the locker room.  His beeper goes off.  He checks the number but decides not to return the call.  We follow him back into the bathroom.  The shower is on but he notices the window.  It's open.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Shit! He rushes over.  He looks out.  No sign of her.  He turns - looks back at the shower.  It's on but he can't see through the curtain.  Can't tell if she's there.  He walks over - quickly - fearing that she's left.  He pulls the curtain aside.  She's crouched in the corner shower stall.  Holding herself.  She looks up at him - her eyes filled with tears.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Are you alright? Jordy sits on the bench next to the shower.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'm not a whore.  I'm not a whore.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I know.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You don't know.  I'm sorry.  I was desperate.  That's not me.  I shot a cop.  Can you imagine what they'll do to me when I got to prison?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: They're not gonna send you right back.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'm sorry.  I didn't mean to...I'm glad. Actually I'm glad it's over.  All this time.  Hiding.  Never being able to look anyone in the eyes. Always afraid that someone would find out who I was.  Never trusting anyone... He covers her with the towel, pulling her up.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You can trust me. She embraces him.  Trusting him.  He stands there for a moment.  Then awkwardly holds her.  Comforting her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: UP on a steak.  Male hands cut a piece.  Another male hand sets down a huge bottle of Extra Strength Excedrin.  The hands abandon the steak and rip open the bottle.  The CAMERA pulls back to include the LCD screen of Oleg's videocamera.  He is taping Emil as he rips open the safety plastic with his teeth.  Emil is sweating with fever and his eyes are glazed over in pain.  He 'drinks' pills from the bottle and chews them up.  Wincing in pain.  Emil washes them down with a beer. Emil looks down and the camera follows his gaze to the "People" magazine article he's reading on Stephen Geller. Emil laughs.  Shaking his head at the article as the videocamera tilts back up to his face.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What is it?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The video of Milos and Tamina - I told you to erase it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I did.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: And the whore's murder?  You didn't erase that either, did you?  Don't lie, I won't be angry.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Why not?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Put the camera down, Oleg. Oleg closes the LCD screen and puts the camera down.  Emil removes a small address book -- from Leon's wallet - he looks up Eddie Flemming's name.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What is that?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What does it look like?  It's an address book! Oleg jumps up with the camera to tape the book.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Let me get a shot of it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Sit down!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This way.  Hold it this way.  Good. Oleg gets a shot and quickly sits back down.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Why won't you be angry at me for keeping my movie? Emil takes a gulp of beer - drops cash on the table and limps away.  Oleg follows.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: It's quiet - Chief Duffy paces in front of the Sergeant's desk.  Looking at his watch.  Growing more and more aggravated as every second ticks by.  Jordy enters escorting Daphne.  Sees Duffy and tires to go past him.  Duffy turns and sees Jordy and Daphne.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Hey.  Warsaw. Jordy stops and comes back.  Sitting Daphne down on a bench.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Hey, Chief, what are you doing here?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I came to see how the investigation was going. (looks at Daphne) I called and you're not here.  I wait up at the station and you don't even show up!!!  I beep you - you don't return my call.  Where the hell have you been?! Jordy takes a few steps away from Daphne.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Ladder 20 was on the Rock for training. We stopped there... so she could get cleaned up.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What do you mean, 'cleaned up?'

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I let her take a shower.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: A shower!?  Did you take one, too?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No!  Nothing happened.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Oh really.  That's nice.  You took a homicide witness to take a shower after your partner was shot?  Are you out of your fucking mind??  Are you having that much trouble gettin' dates?!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I told him to take her there. Jordy and Duffy turn.  Eddie walks out.  Eddie turns - Tommy - the young detective who caught the case in the King Edward Hotel - is coming out of the back office.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tommy, get her outta here. Tommy takes Daphne into the precinct.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This way, ma'am.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: There was too much press hangin' around there.  I didn't want her face on the news.  So I told him to take her to a quiet area until things settled down.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Oh.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: It was my decision, not his.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Well, I'm the Deputy Chief Fire Marshall and every now and then I'd like to be included in decisions.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Look, after Jordy briefs me, you can do the press conference.  How about that? The case is all yours.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Oh yeah...?  Alright.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'm ready to be briefed. (to Duffy) Excuse us.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah, sure. (to Jordy) Beep me when you're ready for the press conference.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Will do, Chief. Eddie leads the way, walking past the Sergeant's desk - toward the back and to his office.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Eddie, I... Eddie holds up his hand - silencing Jordy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Wait.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: A handful of detectives talk about work over burned coffee. Eddie enters with Jordy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Guys...give me a few minutes? They empty out.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Look, Eddie, I'm tellin' you - I didn't touch her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Well, you shoulda because nobody's gonna believe you didn't...including me.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I took her there for a shower and that's it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Just a shower? Eddie gives Jordy a questioning look.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Yeah, just her in the shower.  Nothing happened.  Look, I'm sure you probably think I'm a fool and I fucked up, but...

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No, I don't think you were a fool, I just think you were stupid about it.  I mean, to say the least, you outta know better.  You don't know her well enough. She's got the potential to fucking hang you even if she suggests that you made a pass at her, it's fuckin' over.  You can deny it all you want, but it will not make one fucking bit of difference. You're dead.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I told you, you know, I thought I was doing the right thing, you know, I think she's innocent.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Well, it's not up to you to decide whether she's innocent or not.  Don't you understand, that's why you're a professional.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: But, I mean, didn't you ever go out on a limb for somebody?  I mean, you shoulda heard her there.  Tellin' her whole story...I believed her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: How you go out on a limb for somebody is by giving her a number of an Immigration lawyer.  Here, here's a number of an Immigration lawyer.  That's how you help her. But you can't get involved in her like that.  You're gonna jeopardize your career, your life and you're gonna jeopardize my case.  And lemme give you another piece of advice.  Maybe you don't watch TV but I'll let you in on a little secret - the whole fuckin' world watches television.  And when you get out there, they know your face.  And the little fame, the little fuckin' itty bitty fame that I get in this city makes it a lot easier for my job.  And I get more done because of it. Jordy studies Eddie for a quiet beat.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Why'd you help me back there with the Chief?  Why'd you stand up for me like that?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You know, I don't know.  I like you. You remind me of a puppy I used to have. He pissed on the rug all the time, but I still kept him. Eddie picks up his cigar that's going out.  He sticks it in his mouth.  A match is lit.  He looks up.  Jordy holds the match.  Eddie dips the end of the cigar and puffs.  The homicide detective and the fire marshal hold a look.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Eddie walks in - carrying flowers.  He closes and locks the door behind him.  He grabs the phone.  Dials.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: It's Flemming...anything turn up?  Did they check the hospitals?  Airports? Yeah, I hit him!  I fuckin' hit him!  We should be all over everywhere - with dogs, choppers, everything!  These guys are from fuckin' Czechoslovakia... He looks at the flowers.  Decides to put the case behind him for a moment.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'll call you later. He HANGS up.  Arranges the flowers in a vase.  So they look perfect.  Sets them on the coffee table.  Fills out a card, writes, "Nicky, I love you. Will you marry me?"  He sticks the card in the flowers - turns the lights down low.  Puts a romantic Sinatra song on the stereo.  Moves to the liquor cabinet.  Pours himself a drink.  He sets the ringbox on the coffee table - next to the flowers.  There's a knock at the door.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Coming! Eddie smooths his hair, unlocks the door.  But the hallway is empty.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Nicky!?!? No answer.  Eddie steps out in the hallway with the drink in his hand.  Walks toward the elevator.  Doesn't notice the shadow that passes behind him - entering his apartment. Eddie turns.  No sign of anyone.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Nicky?! He walks back toward his apartment.  Turns and locks the door.  A BLUR jumps out of the shadows SLAMMING him on the head with a gun.  Eddie tumbles to the floor!  OUT COLD!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as it's focused - on Eddie - handcuffed and upper body taped to a chair - 20 minutes later - sobered up.  Emil is sitting in front of him.  On the coffee table alongside him are the flowers in a vase.  They've ransacked the place.  Emil has Eddie's watch, his gold shield and his money.  He's smoking one of Eddie's cigars and in Emil's hand...is the diamond engagement ring and card.  Oleg, 60 MINUTES-style, is positioned behind Emil videotaping Eddie.  He moves to the corner of the room - bringing a light back over to illuminate Eddie's face.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: So...who's Nicky?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What do you want?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Your opinion. (leaning forward) You see, they going to make a movie about me, too, Eddie.  And write books.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: What's your accomplishment.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I kill someone famous.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Then do it, asshole.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Good - be tough to the end.  Actor who plays you will want to die like hero. Eddie looks at the videocamera.  Emil answers Eddie's look.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: So tabloids don't have to do re enactments.  They going to have real movie this time.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: If you kill me and film it you're putting a noose around your neck. Emil turns to Oleg.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Turn it off. Oleg obeys.  Emil turns to Eddie.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No.  We are insane.  Who else but crazy men would film their murders? (gestures to Eddie) So we kill someone famous and if we are caught, we are sent to mental hospital. But what good is money there?  Because once in hospital I say I not crazy. Just pretended to be acquitted.  We see psychiatrists.  They must certify we are sane and because of your - what is law called? (Eddie says nothing) Oh - I got it.  Because of your Double Jeopardy law, we can't be tried for same crime twice.  We come out free, rich and famous!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Good idea!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You really think you'll be able to fool a jury with this bullshit?  How fuckin' stupid are you?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Smarter than Americans.  You're fed cry baby talk shows all day long.  Not only will Americans believe me, they'll cry for me. (laughs) So...Detective Eddie Flemming, would you like to say goodbye to your Nicolette? Maybe you can propose to her now? Eddie says nothing.  Just stares at Emil.  Emil puffs on Eddie's cigar.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Okay.  He has nothing to say. (signaling Oleg) Start the camera!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Cut! Emil looks at Oleg.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This is my project.  I say 'action.'  I am the director!  You are the talent. You wait for me to say 'action!' Emil looks at Eddie as if to say, "See what I have to put up with."  Oleg gestures from behind the videocamera.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: And...action! Oleg FILMS as Emil raises Eddie's service revolver.  Eddie suddenly KICKS at Emil's hand, but Emil pulls it away, backing out of Eddie's reach.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Bad last moment - I cut that out. Emil raises the pistol again - pointing the gun at Eddie's left temple.  Emil cocks the hammer, but Eddie avoids the gun, ducking his head to the side of Emil's arm.  Standing and following his head up Emil's arm and pushing him over into the desk.  Eddie then knocks Emil with the chair and Emil falls off the desk and onto the floor. Oleg still grips the videocamera.  Eddie continues around with the chair and drives Oleg back across the room - pinning him to the wall. Eddie comes back from Oleg to the gun at the same time as Emil is limping for it.  Eddie knocks Emil out of the way with the chair and then stabs him with the legs of the chair repeatedly. Eddie comes up and around again at Oleg who is coming at him from the wall.  Eddie knocks Oleg over the coffee table and onto the sofa.  Falling on top of him, rolling over and leaving Oleg on the sofa. Eddie manages to get up from the sofa and position the chair in such a way that he can fall over backward and grab the gun.  Emil limps toward the gun at the same time and it is not clear in the darkness who has the gun. Oleg gets up from the sofa and goes over to get the videocamera.  Eddie has managed to get the gun and comes up as Oleg is moving in with the camera and starts shooting toward Oleg - managing to shoot one of the blinds off the window and one of the lampshades off the lamp. Oleg crouches down with the camera and Eddie starts to turn toward Emil who comes at him with the knife and stabs him in the stomach. Emil steps back, revealing the knife is BURIED IN EDDIE'S STOMACH. Eddie stumbles backward, falling over but still attached to the chair - holding the gun.  Eddie can't believe he got stabbed.  Blood swells around his stomach.  He can't be dying.  This can't be happening.  He looks at Emil.  The pain is terrible.  Oleg has knelt down next to Eddie - getting a close up. Emil looks at Eddie.

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Where the hell is he?  Goddamn it?! Jordy glares at Emil.  Emil looks back at Jordy, gloating. Smiles.  He won.  He beat the system.  Jordy suddenly erupts.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You think this is funny??  What the hell are you laughing at? Emil stares down Jordy.  Jordy grips the gun inside the jacket.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Officer, keep this man back, he's assaulted my client on previous occasions.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: blocks Jordy from Emil.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This is it?  This bastard kills the best cop this city ever had and we do nothing?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: You may not like it marshal, but that's the law.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: And what about the other victims??  What about their families?  He'll end up in some country club nuthouse while his lawyer sells his rights to the movies and we just stand here and do nothing? We let this scumbag walk? Jordy moves past the officer.  Emil breaks away from Cutler. Gets in Jordy's face.  Laughs quietly.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Be careful.  I can kill you.  I'm insane. Jordy shoves Emil into Cutler.  A scuffle breaks out as the cops separate the two - pulling Jordy back as we cut to:

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as it approaches Hawkins from behind.  A hand dips into frame tapping Hawkins on the shoulder.  Hawkins turns - sees who he's been waiting for.  His face lights up.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I thought you wouldn't show up.  Where is it?  Where is the tape?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: In disguise - sunglasses and a hat.  Holding his videocamera.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: It's all in here.  All in here.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: has been separated from Cutler and Emil as Hawkins' voice cuts above the din of the crowd, announcing excitedly:

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Wait a minute, Bruce!  We've got some interesting evidence, something you should look at! Reporters turn as Hawkins speaks.  His crew is taping as he continues introducing his broadcast:

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I have exclusive rights to the ORIGINAL UNCUT videotape shot by Oleg Razgul, proving Emil Slovak was not insane! Hard to believe...watch! Reporters swing their cameras over as Oleg holds his videocamera up in the air.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He knew exactly what he was doing - all of this was planned!  It's all here in my movie.  Emil is not insane.  Look. Look! Oleg PLAYS his videocamera as lenses focus, we see excerpts of the moment where Emil explains to Eddie:

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ...so we kill someone famous and if we are caught, we are sent to mental hospital...

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Officers, there's your killer, do your duty, arrest him! The police are attempting to get to Oleg, but a sea of reporters separate them.  We hear the staccato calls from the press corps.  Nicolette looks on in amazed outrage.  Jordy notices and starts moving towards her.  Before the POLICE CAPTAIN in charge of the detail can react, the rage which killed Milos, Tamina and Honey wells up inside Emil.  He yells at Oleg!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Traitor!!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No.  You are the traitor.  You are murderer.  I am director.  Action! Oleg pulls his gun.  Emil pulls Cutler in front of him as:

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ! Oleg FIRES!  Cutler is SHOT and goes down.  Hawkins swings his camera over to Oleg - filming the would-be assassin. Oleg FIRES off another SHOT - hitting the COURT OFFICER escorting Emil.  Emil grabs the down officer's gun.  He swivels - rapid fires at Oleg.  Oleg topples.  People are screaming.  It's CHAOS. Emil darts forward - grabbing Nicolette who is closes to him. He puts his handcuffed arms over her head - points the gun at her head.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Drop the gun!  DON'T SHOOT!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'll kill her!  Back off!  Everyone back away from me! We hear Jordy's voice above Emil.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Let her go.  Let her fucking go!! The captain is screaming at all his men.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No one shoot!  Lower your weapons!  Do not fire!  No officer will fire his weapon unless I say so! (to Emil) Let the woman go! Cops reluctantly lower their weapons.  But Jordy is still aiming his gun at Emil.  He is the only one who hasn't lowered his gun.  The captain is yelling at him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Holster your weapons!  Back away.  That is an order!  No officers will fire! Emil is screaming back at the captain as Jordy screams at Emil.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tell him to put his gun down!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Let her go!  Let her go!!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: If he doesn't lower his gun I'll fucking kill her. Jordy doesn't lower his gun.  Emil tries to back away.  The reporters - who have ducked and covered - are still keeping their lenses pointed at the scene.  This is great film! Jordy follows after Emil - his gun raised.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Let her go.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Shoot!  Shoot him!!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Shut up! Meanwhile, the captain is still yelling:

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No on shoot!  No one shoot!!  No officer will follow.  No officer will shoot! Nicolette is still encouraging Jordy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Shoot!  Shoot!  Shoot him!!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Shut up! Everyone is screaming at once.  It's mass chaos.  The captain is trying to keep everyone calm.  Cops following along with their weapons lowered.  All except Jordy - his gun still pointed at Emil. Hawkins can't believe what footage he's getting.  He's pushing his cameraman to the front of the pack.  Trying to get the best coverage.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'll surrender!! I'll surrender if he lowers his gun. He's pointing at Jordy but he's continuing to back away towards the police boat.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Don't.  Don't let him surrender.  Shoot him! Jordy won't take his gun off him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Let her go.  Let her go. The captain is yelling at Jordy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Lower your weapon.  I told you - lower your weapon! Jordy struggles to get a clean shot at Emil.  He can't.  His heart pounding.  Adrenaline pumping.  He suddenly lowers his weapon.  Turns away.  The captain visibly relaxes.  Emil laughs.  Jordy suddenly turns back.  Quickly raises his weapon.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Emil takes a shot in the leg.  Nicolette ducks under the handcuffs and scurries away.  Emil looks at Jordy - surprised he shot him.  Jordy FIRES AGAIN.  Emil is hit in the shoulder.  Jordy marches forward, EMPTYING HIS CLIP in Emil's chest.  Abdomen.  Head.  Gun fire echoes in the humid air as Emil stumbles back.  Does a funny dance and drops to the ground.  Dead.  The captain yells.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I told you not to shoot!  No officers should shoot. Jordy quietly answers:

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: I'm not a cop.  I'm a fire marshal.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He's still alive. Hawkins looks down at Oleg.  He is sprawled on the ground. His videocamera in hand - he's still making the movie.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as it ZOOMS from the Statue of Liberty and PANS to Oleg.  He looks in the lens with his dying eyes, gasps:

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: A film...by Oleg Razgul. And Oleg dies but suddenly his eyes pop WIDE OPEN.  Hawkins jumps back, Oleg smiles, coughing in pain.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: How was that? Oleg's head rolls to one side.  Now dead.  Nicolette runs over to Jordy.  Composing herself.  Coming together.  Glad Emil is dead.  Jordy starts to walk away.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Wait a minute.  Where are you going? Learn from Eddie.  Talk to the court of public opinion.  Take the credit, you need it. She turns him around.  Straightens his tie.  Starts to push the hair out of his face but he stops her hand.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: No thanks. Jordy puts something in her hand.  She looks down.  It's

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: .  The one Jordy took out of Daphne's bathroom. She looks up at him.  Her cameraman rolling.  The lens pointed at Jordy.  Jordy looks at Nicolette.  Meets her eyes. He doesn't want to make a statement.  He still doesn't want the fame.  He did learn from Eddie.  Eddie was killed because he was a celebrity.  Jordy wants no part of it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Cut. Her cameraman lowers his leans.  Jordy smiles.  She nods. Jordy turns and walks away.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Get a shot of him leaving.  Then pan to me. Jordy disappears into the sea of people.  The camera PANS back to Nicolette.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Well, he wouldn't talk to us, but you saw it. The CAMERA PULLS BACK from Nicolette's face and the video is now on:
